mapper.sql: st.Student_Id, st.Student_Name, st.Student_State, st.Sex, st.Student_Phone, st.Address, st.ImgAddress, st.ParentName, st.ParentPhone, st.Student_Number, st.Entrance, st.StudyTime, st.AddName, st.ADDTIME, st.UpdateName, st.UpdateTime, st.DeleteName, st.DeleteTime, st.TimeLiness, st.Classes_Id, st.Source_Id, st.Register_Id
mapper.select:
select
from tr01904.student st inner join classes cl on st.Classes_Id=cl.Classes_Id inner join register re on st.Register_Id=re.Register_Id inner join source so on st.Source_Id=so.Source_Id where st.TimeLiness = 0 order by st.Student_Id desc

select Student_Id, Student_Name, Student_State, Sex, Student_Phone, Address, ImgAddress, ParentName, ParentPhone, Student_Number, Entrance, StudyTime, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Classes_Id, Source_Id, Register_Id from tr01904.student where Classes_Id = #{classesId} and TimeLiness = 0

select Student_Id, Student_Name, Student_State, Sex, Student_Phone, Address, ImgAddress, ParentName, ParentPhone, Student_Number, Entrance, StudyTime, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Classes_Id, Source_Id, Register_Id from tr01904.student where Student_State = 0 and TimeLiness = 0

select Student_Id, Student_Name, Student_State, Sex, Student_Phone, Address, ImgAddress, ParentName, ParentPhone, Student_Number, Entrance, StudyTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Classes_Id, Source_Id, Register_Id from tr01904.student limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into tr01904.student(Student_Name, Student_State, Sex, Student_Phone, Address, ImgAddress, ParentName, ParentPhone, Student_Number, Entrance, StudyTime, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Classes_Id, Source_Id, Register_Id) values (#{studentName}, #{studentState}, #{sex}, #{studentPhone}, #{address}, #{imgaddress}, #{parentname}, #{parentphone}, #{studentNumber}, #{entrance}, #{studytime}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness}, #{classesId}, #{sourceId}, #{registerId})

insert into tr01904.student(Student_Name, Student_State, Sex, Student_Phone, Address, ImgAddress, ParentName, ParentPhone, Student_Number, Entrance, StudyTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Classes_Id, Source_Id, Register_Id) values
(#{entity.studentName}, #{entity.studentState}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.studentPhone}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.imgaddress}, #{entity.parentname}, #{entity.parentphone}, #{entity.studentNumber}, #{entity.entrance}, #{entity.studytime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.classesId}, #{entity.sourceId}, #{entity.registerId})

insert into tr01904.student(Student_Name, Student_State, Sex, Student_Phone, Address, ImgAddress, ParentName, ParentPhone, Student_Number, Entrance, StudyTime, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Classes_Id, Source_Id, Register_Id) values
(#{entity.studentName}, #{entity.studentState}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.studentPhone}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.imgaddress}, #{entity.parentname}, #{entity.parentphone}, #{entity.studentNumber}, #{entity.entrance}, #{entity.studytime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.classesId}, #{entity.sourceId}, #{entity.registerId})
on duplicate key update Student_Name = values(Student_Name) , Student_State = values(Student_State) , Sex = values(Sex) , Student_Phone = values(Student_Phone) , Address = values(Address) , ImgAddress = values(ImgAddress) , ParentName = values(ParentName) , ParentPhone = values(ParentPhone) , Student_Number = values(Student_Number) , Entrance = values(Entrance) , StudyTime = values(StudyTime) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness) , Classes_Id = values(Classes_Id) , Source_Id = values(Source_Id) , Register_Id = values(Register_Id)
mapper.update:
update tr01904.student
Student_Name = #{studentName},
Student_State = #{studentState},
Sex = #{sex},
Student_Phone = #{studentPhone},
Address = #{address},
ImgAddress = #{imgaddress},
ParentName = #{parentname},
ParentPhone = #{parentphone},
Student_Number = #{studentNumber},
Entrance = #{entrance},
StudyTime = #{studytime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
Classes_Id = #{classesId},
Source_Id = #{sourceId},
Register_Id = #{registerId},
where Student_Id = #{studentId}
